custom-sql.sql: SELECT CalendarResource.* FROM CalendarResource WHERE (companyId = ?) AND [$GROUP_ID$] [$CLASS_NAME_ID$] ( (lower(code_) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (lower(name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) [$AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] (description LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) ) AND (active_ = ?) [$ORDER_BY$]
